tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CarbonOffsetProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    carbon_saved DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE carbon_offset_projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    greenhouse_gas_type VARCHAR(50),
    efficiency_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE project_monitoring (
    monitoring_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id UUID,
    monitoring_date DATE,
    carbon_offset_metric FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_project_id
        FOREIGN KEY (project_id)
        REFERENCES carbon_offset_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE carbon_offset_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    carbon_offset_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE project_measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    measurement_date DATE,
    efficiency_score DECIMAL(5,2),
    emissions_reduction DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE carbon_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    metric_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CarbonOffsetProjects (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  project_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  project_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectMetrics (
  metric_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  metric_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  metric_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  metric_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES CarbonOffsetProjects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectParticipants (
  participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  participant_role VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  participant_contact VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES CarbonOffsetProjects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectExpenses (
  expense_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  expense_description TEXT,
  expense_amount FLOAT NOT NULL,
  expense_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES CarbonOffsetProjects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectReports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  report_description TEXT,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES CarbonOffsetProjects (project_id)
);
